summary: A standalone and simple Follower Mod
descriptionHtml:
This follower is standalone and based on my highelf preset - Ignis

[b]Location: [/b]

Found in the Bannered Mare of Whiterun, Top Floor (console command "coc whiterunbanneredmare" to teleport to the place)


[b]Combat:[/b]

- obsessed with destruction spells, will rarely use melee weapons
- can use staves, won't use shouts
- comes with no armor and weapon (just thalmor clothes so he isn't naked)
- Lightfoot perk, some basic perks for destruction, if it's too OP, please let me know!
- levels with you
- essential, unique


[b]Misc.:[/b]

- can be married
- can be a steward (he should meet the requirements because of voicetype and being a follower, I can be wrong)
- voice is MaleEvenToned


[b]Armors I used for the screenshots:
[/b]
Kynreeve Armor (Elleh)
Ritual Armor of Boethiah (Washbunny)


I wish you good hunting with him!



[b]Credits [/b]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411]Brows[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdo's - Renewal[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88254]Smooth Silky Straight KS Hairdos Retexture [/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74948/]Lind's Elven Eyes[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145]Smooth Body Textures for Better Males and SoS[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures for Men[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/498-sos-schlongs-of-skyrim/]SoS Body - nsfw site[/url]
author: Thrwomp
